title: Social2Earn
author: Social2Earn
content: About #STOEThe idea of ​​Social2earn is one of the cryptocurrency ideas released like play2earn and move2earn and is the first and only social media project to address Social media platforms. Unlike the known decentralized social media, the Social2earn project was created to address the idea of ​​a completely decentralized and free social media platform.The Social2earn project used the abbreviation STOE as the platform. The Social2earn project has an infrastructure built by building the Binance Smart Chain infrastructure and handling smart contracts. It has an infrastructure that can deal with all kinds of social issues completely freely without any subject concept. Of course, the STOE project, which is currently in the development and BETA phase, is one of the technology and social media platforms of the future. continues its funding and development phase. The STOE project, which will be developed and will continue to be developed completely community-oriented, will be developed by all developers and can be managed with a voting system.The importance of the voting system and the management systemBlockchain, as everyone knows, has an immutable and uncontrollable verification mechanism. My voting system is used to prevent all negative and illegal content that may occur within the social media platform and other STOE members can remove dangerous content from the platform by voting.All software that is required to be developed within the platform can be added by the developers, and STOE users can vote to add the features they want to see on the platform by voting. All voting and content additions are made with smart contracts.Earn Profit!All posts you share are made available for STOE Token donation! Other members can support you by sending STOE Tokens to all the content you share, or you can earn by making the content you want paid!No More Unwanted Accounts and Bots!Accounts created by Web 3.0 use the Bubblemap system and blocked accounts do not allow new bot accounts to be opened thanks to Bubblemap SCAN services. Only real and verified people can use the platform. Users are seen as trustworthy only as STOE score to ensure trust and clean account. Members earn STOE points as they spend time on the STOE platform. The STOE score can be called a kind of Karma or Trust score.Access with Web 3.0!It is possible to become a member of the STOE Platform only by connecting your Wallet. Anyone who verifies their profile can automatically get the Verified Account (Blue-Tick Account). KYC verifications are automatically identified and with your current wallet > BASE58 > SHA256 encryption matched with your wallet and transmitted to the blockchain. Verified KYC information belonging to your STOE Account cannot be changed or deleted! Each KYC account can match one account.Not restricted by countries!STOE Social media platform cannot be restricted by countries or controlled by any other authorized lens! Designed with Web 3.0 infrastructure, STOE platform works 100% connected to smart contract and blockchain.STOE TokenThe BEP20 token to be used on the STOE platform will be the Social2Earn (STOE) Token created specifically for the STOE platform.Token for the Community!The STOE Token token produced for the Social2Earn platform is a BEP20 Token created using the Binance Smart Chain network, and 100% of the STOE Token amount was Fair Launched.There are no STOE Tokens owned by the developers of the project for the team, platform or any other profit motive! Ownership of STOE Token has been waived and its smart contract cannot be edited!Buy on PancakeswapA fair launch was made on the Pancakeswap decentralized exchange with the STOE Token BNB Token parity. The amount of Cake-LP obtained is locked at 100% for 6 months. STOE Token and its smart contract have the following certificates and contract approvals.0x010826d8d24a1fe3343bac23864f640d078211eaINFO TokenToken Name: Social2EarnToken Symbol: STOETotal Supply: 777.000.000 STOECir. Supply: 777.000.000 STOEChain: BSCDecimals: 9A 2% fee is charged for STOE Token trading to contribute to marketing and charity balances. The fee amount, which is at a very low rate, is quite ideal and sufficient for the purchase and sale interruption.https://social2earn.org/token.htmlhttps://stoe.social2earn.orghttps://twitter.com/stoe_officialhttps://t.me/Social2earn

comments.author: Blowon
comments.body: when will Fairlaunch start?and when your platform is ready to be used, besides that there are still many shortcomings on the website, the main thing that must be on the website is the roadmap, as well as documents regarding the Stoe platform in detail
